instruction: Put together a business plan for a new restaurant.
output: The new restaurant will be located in a vibrant and high-traffic part of town. It will offer a broad menu of delicious and reasonably priced meals along with an excellent selection of drinks. In addition to the restaurant, there will be a takeout and catering service available. The atmosphere will be warm and inviting and will feature art from local artists. The business plan aims to build a sustainable and profitable business. The budget includes start-up costs and ongoing expenses such as rent, insurance, salaries, marketing, and utilities.
